<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 279 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 35 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** strapped to 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=17)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _glamorous [buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=17)_ is lavishly decorated with gilding and inset gemstones that glitter in the light. While you have it raised, the _glamorous buckler_ grants you a +1 item bonus to Deception checks to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=2390).

**Activate—Dazzling Feint** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=2390); **Requirements** You have the glamorous buckler raised; **Effect** As you Feint, the _glamorous buckler_ sparkles mightily. On a successful Feint, the target is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=65) for 1 round.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
